Given its high value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I propose a price of $125 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a great opportunity to secure this item at a reasonable yet competitive price. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
